Image.Alt: A group of scouts setting up Christmas Tree racks. The racks are lashed together, and have two A-frame supports on each end, with a thick tree branch going between the two.
Image.Caption: Scouts setting up the Christmas Tree racks.

Image.Alt: Four scouts unloading a wrapped Christmas tree off the back of a flat-bed trailer behind a black pick-up truck.
Image.Caption: Scouts unloading Christmas Trees.

Image.Alt: A handful of scouts start among a few green dome-shaped tents.
Image.Caption: Scouts preparing the Campsite.

Image.Alt: A group photo of the troop, everyone is looking at the camera, smiling!
Image.Caption: Group Photo!
